001package tests;
002
003import priorityqueues.ladderq.LadderQ;
004import priorityqueues.linkedlistq.LinkedListQ;
005import priorityqueues.scq.SCQ;
006import priorityqueues.splaytree.SplayTree;
007import utilities.XYPlot;
008
009/**
010 * Testing of all priority queues.
011 * @author Borja Zarco
012 */
013public class PriorityQueues {
014
015    /**
016     * description of the performance tests of the priority queues
017     */
018    public static void performanceTest() {
019        XYPlot plot = new XYPlot();
020        
021        System.gc();
022        LinkedListQ linkedListQTest = new LinkedListQ();
023        plot.addSeries(linkedListQTest.holdModelTest("LinkedListQ",false));
024        linkedListQTest = null;
025        
026        System.gc();
027        SCQ scqTest = new SCQ();
028        plot.addSeries(scqTest.holdModelTest("SCQ",false));
029        scqTest = null;
030        
031        System.gc();
032        SplayTree splayTreeTest = new SplayTree();
033        plot.addSeries(splayTreeTest.holdModelTest("SplayTree",false));
034        splayTreeTest = null;
035        
036        System.gc();
037        LadderQ ladderQTest = new LadderQ();
038        plot.addSeries(ladderQTest.holdModelTest("LadderQ",false));
039        ladderQTest = null;
040        
041        plot.showPlot(800,600,"Hold Model Test - Intel i7 930 @ 2.80GHz","Queue Size","Time (milliseconds)",null,new double[]{0,300},true,"HoldModel_ALL.jpg");
042    }
043    
044    /**
045     * description of the unit test for the priority queues
046     */
047    public static void unitTest() {
048        LinkedListQ linkedListQTest = new LinkedListQ();
049        linkedListQTest.simpleTest("LinkedListQ");
050        
051        SCQ scqTest = new SCQ();
052        scqTest.simpleTest("SCQ");
053        
054        SplayTree splayTreeTest = new SplayTree();
055        splayTreeTest.simpleTest("SplayTree");
056        
057        LadderQ ladderQTest = new LadderQ();
058        ladderQTest.simpleTest("LadderQ");
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Main method to run priority queues testing.
063     * @param args the command line arguments
064     */
065    public static void main(String[] args) {
066        PriorityQueues.unitTest();
067        PriorityQueues.performanceTest();
068    }
069    
070}
